entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 25. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 35 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 30%
